List species matching criteria

Source: R/ala_checklist.R
ala_checklist.Rd

List species matching criteria

ala_checklist(taxon_id, filters, geometry, caching = FALSE)

Arguments

taxon_id

string: single species ID or vector of species ids. Use `ala_taxa()` to get lookup species id.
filters

string: a list to narrow down the search, in the form `list(field = value)`. To limit the query to a year range, use `list(year = c(1990, 2000))`. This will return records between and including the years provided.
geometry

string: WKT generated by `ala_geometry()`
caching

string: should the results be cached? Either "on" or "off"

Value

dataframe of matching species, with optional additional details.

Contents

Developed by Matilda Stevenson, Martin Westgate, Peggy Newman, Ben Raymond, Jeremy VanDerWal, Lee Belbin.
